st: Kitna Chaahata Hun Tujhe Yeh Mujhko Pata Nahi,
s:
Kitna Chaahata Hun Tujhe Yeh Mujhko Pata Nahi,
Magar Tumhare Siwa Koi Aur Dil Mein Basa Nahi,

Zamana Dusman Ho Gaya Chaahat Ka Hamari,
Juda Ho Gaye Phir Se Ham Yeh Meri Khata Nahi….

st: Tere Hote Huye Bhi Tanhai Mili Hai,
s:
Tere Hote Huye Bhi Tanhai Mili Hai,
Wafa Karke Bhi Dekho Buraai Mili Hai,

Jitni Dua Ki Tumhe Pane Ki,
Us se Jayada Teri Judai Mili Hai…

st: Subah Juda Hai Raat Juda Hai,
s:
Subah Juda Hai Raat Juda Hai,
Apni To Her Baat Juda Hai,
Tumse Bichar Ker Aisa Laga,
Jaise Dua Main Haath Juda Hai,
Sab To Aate Rahte Hai,
Tum Aao To Baat Juda Hai…

st: Koi Pakar To Koi Khokar Juda Hota Hai,
s:
Koi Pakar To Koi Khokar Juda Hota Hai,
Koi Hanskar To Koi Rokar Juda Hota Hai,
Magar Juda Hone Ka Dard Tab Hota Hai,
Jab Koi Kisi Ka Hokar Juda Hota Hai…

st: Chhodkar Chala Jaaun Ab Teri Yeh Duniya,
s:
Chhodkar Chala Jaaun Ab Teri Yeh Duniya,
Mere Data Mujhko Itni Si Izazat De De,

Maine Payi Hai Nafrat Sada Teri Di Zindagi Se,
Maut Toh Laga Le Gale Itni Mohabbat De De….

st: Dard E Judai Sahne Ki Aadat Si Ho Gayi,
s:
Dard E Judai Sahne Ki Aadat Si Ho Gayi,
Gham Na Kisi Se Kahne Ki Aadat Si Ho Gayi,

Hokar Juda Bhi Yaar Ne Le Liya Jeene Ka Wada,
Rote Huye Bhi Jinda Rahne Ki Aadat Si Ho Gayi…

st: Ishq Chhupta Hai Chhupane Se Kahan,
s:
Ishq Chhupta Hai Chhupane Se Kahan,
Yeh Khud Be Khud Samne Aata Hai,

Nahi Bachta Is Se Koi Bhi Kabhi,
Yeh Sab Ko Hi Bada Tadpata Hai…

st: Tere Jaane Ke Baad Sanam Mere,
s:
Tere Jaane Ke Baad Sanam Mere,
Sochta Hun Ke Kaise Jiyunga Main,

Tujhse Kiya Hai Isi Liye Wada,
Yeh Judai Ka Zahar Bhi Piyunga Main….

st: Insan Kahan Marta Hai Auron Ka Mara Hua,
s:
Insan Kahan Marta Hai Auron Ka Mara Hua,
Insan Ko Khud Uski Tanhai Maar Deti Hai,

Yun Toh Ji Bhi Sakta Hai Yeh Yaar Ki Judai Mein,
Magar Isko Toh Yahan Jag Hansayi Maar Deti Hai…

st: Aap Toh Chalo Jaaoge Magar Kaise Jiyenge Hum,
s:
Aap Toh Chalo Jaaoge Magar Kaise Jiyenge Hum,
Aapki Judai Ka Jahar Kaise Piyenge Hum,

Aap Bhale Hi Bhula Dena Apne Sagar Ko Magar,
Na Bhule Se Bhi Kabhi Apne Gham Siyenge Hum….

st: Aap Kya Jaano Kya Hota Hai Dard Judai Ka,
s:
Aap Kya Jaano Kya Hota Hai Dard Judai Ka,
Humse Yeh Puchho Kaisa Haal Hota Hai Tanhai Ka,

Mout Ko Laga Lete Hain Majboor Hokar Gale Yaaro,
Aisa Hota Hai Jab Bhi Hota Hai Hashar Rushwai Ka…

st: Gham Hi Mile Itne Jeevan Mein,
s:
Gham Hi Mile Itne Jeevan Mein,
Ki Khusiyon Ko Bulana Bhool Gaye,

Huva Teri Judai Mein Aisa Aalam,
Ki Hum Apna Hi Thikana Bhool Gaye….

st: Juda Tumse Hokar Kisi Tarah Jee Toh Raha Hun Main,
s:
Juda Tumse Hokar Kisi Tarah Jee Toh Raha Hun Main,
Yeh Judai Ka Jahar Main Hardam Pee Toh Raha Hun,

Yeh Maalum Hai Mujhko Ki Mere Jakham Bhar Na Sakenge,
Magar In Jakhamon Ko Main Fir Bhi Si Toh Raha Hun…

st: Jo Gujaare Hain Pal Humne Saath Unke,
s:
Jo Gujaare Hain Pal Humne Saath Unke,
Hum Un Palon Ko Hi Dil Mein Utar Lenge,

Bas Aap Khus Raho Yeh Dua Hai Sagar Ki,
Hamara Kya Hai Hum Zindagi Yun Hi Gujar Lenge…

st: Apno Ne Hamein Yeh Shikhaya Hai,
s:
Apno Ne Hamein Yeh Shikhaya Hai,
Ki Bewafayi Kya Hoti Hai,

Door Unse Huye Toh Jana,
Ki Judai Kya Hoti Hai…

st: Teri Judayi Mein Sajan, Tere Patro Ka Sahara Hai,
s:
Teri Judayi Mein Sajan, Tere Patro Ka Sahara Hai,
Viraan Meri Yeh Duniya, Tu Sansaar Hamara Hai,

Najar Mila Nahi Sakti, Maafi Mangna Chahti Hun,
Khat Likhti Hun Isliye, Galti Sudharna Chahti Hun…

st: Koi Kabhi Khat Likhe,
s:
Koi Kabhi Khat Likhe,
Yadi Naa Likhe To Woh Khatawar Hai,

Bhrosa Kare Jo Judai Ke Jahar Par,
Toh Woh Bharose Daar Hai,

Kabhi Mile Ya Na Mile,
Kuchh Likhe Ya Na Likhe Bharosa Rakhna,

Agar Aap Sada Dil Se Likhta Hain,
Toh Aap Dildaar Hain…

st: Khate Hain Kasam Hum,
s:
Khate Hain Kasam Hum,
Aapko Kabhi Khone Nahin Denge,

Aap Ho Jaao Hum Se Juda,
Hum Aisa Hone Nahin Denge,

Aaapko Bhijwa Rahe Hain,
Keemti Tohfa Machhron Ka,

Jo Raaat Bhar,
Aap Ko Sone Nahin Denge…

st: Akela Mehsoos Karo Jab Tanhai Mein
s:
Akela Mehsoos Karo Jab Tanhai Mein
Yaad Meri Aaye Jab Judai Mein
Main Tumhare Pass Hun Har Pal
Jab Chahe Dekh Lena Apni Parchhayi Mein…

st: wo aati thi milne hamse kabhi kabhi,
s:
wo aati thi milne hamse kabhi kabhi,
lagta tha nahi hongey juda ham kabhi,
Ab wo hamari kahan,
Chhod gayi hamari jaan hamay yahan,
Ab toh bas aati hai yaad,
Aaati hai sapno mein kabhi kabhi…

st: Khawab Tha Bhikar Gaya, Khayal Tha Mila Nahi,
s:
Khawab Tha Bhikar Gaya, Khayal Tha Mila Nahi,
Magar Ye Dil Ko Kya Hua, Ye Kyu Bujha Pata Nahi,
Tamam Din Udaas Din, Tamaam Shab Udasiyan,
Kissi Se Kya Bichad Gaya, Ke Jaise Kuch Bacha Nahi…

st: Jab Dhundo Ge Hame, Kareeb Hi Paoge,
s:
Jab Dhundo Ge Hame, Kareeb Hi Paoge,
Hum Sa Juda Hoker Tum Kaha Jaoge,
Galti Hui Hai Hum Se, Bewafai Ka Naam Mat Dijiye,
Judai Ka Dar Dikha Kar, Maut Mere Naam Na Kijiye….

st: Tum Kya Jaano Kya Hoti Hai Tanhai,
s:
Tum Kya Jaano Kya Hoti Hai Tanhai,
Tute Hue Patte Se Puchho Kya Hoti Hai Judai,
Yu Bewafai Ka Iljam Na Do Mere Dost,
Is Waqt Se Puchho Kab Yaad Teri, Mujhe Nahi Aai…
